titles.title: I See The Lord, I See The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I see the Lord. I see the Lord.
He is high and lifted up and His train fills the temple. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The angels cry Holy. The angels cry Holy.
The angels cry Holy is the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I hear the Lord. I hear the Lord.
He is high and lifted up and His voice fills the temple. (2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The angels cry Holy. The angels cry Holy.
The angels cry holy is the Lord.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I saw the Lord. I saw the Lord.
His eyes were filled with love and His face shone with glory. (2x)

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
The angels cry Holy. The angels cry Holy.
The angels cry Holy is the Lord.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I found the Lord. I found the Lord.
I found Him in His word and I found Him by the Spirit.
I found Him in my brother and I found Him in the body.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
The sons cry perfect. The sons cry perfect.
The sons cry perfect is the Lord.

verse.name: v9
v10
verse.lines:
/Los santos cantan, Gloria/ (2)
Los santos cantan, Gloria al Señor
